page.title: 04Transport
page.content: Buses: There are 2 return journeys per week from Alton to Basingstoke via Upton Grey but none at Weston Patrick. Cars: Most families have a motor car many have two. Husbands drive to work or to a railway station to go to London on business. Horses:Used for pleasure riding, show jumping and hunting not for transport Taxis: Ordered by telephone the fare is approximately Â£3.50 per mile Trains: Nearest railway station for a regular service is Hook 5 miles from Weston Patrick. Electric and deisel electric trains run to London, Portsmouth,Southampton and Bournemouth at half hour intervals. Bicycles: Used by some children to travel to school but most travel by a special school bus provided by the Education Authority or are driven to school by parents in their cars.
